desc.one-way: Contacts can view, download, and add the content to their Cozy. If they add the content to their Cozy, they will get updates you make to the content, but they won't be able to update it.
desc.two-way: Contacts can update, delete and add the content to their Cozy. Updates on the content will be seen on other Cozies.

Share.locked-type-file: Coming soon: you will be able to change permissions you grant on the file.
Share.locked-type-folder: Coming soon: you will be able to change permissions you grant on the folder.

permissionRequired.title: Save your contacts in your Cozy?
permissionRequired.desc: Authorize the application to access to your Cozy's contacts: you'll be able to select them next time.
permissionRequired.success: The application has access to your contacts

twoStepsConfirmation.title: Confirm contact's identity
twoStepsConfirmation.contactAreWaitingForConfirmation: Some contacts are waiting for your confirmation. Confirm their identities to allow them to access items you shared with them.||||%{smart_count} contacts are waiting for your confirmation. Confirm their identities to allow them to access items you shared with them.
twoStepsConfirmation.confirmRejection: Do you really want to reject contact %{userName} (%{userEmail})?

banner.synchronise: Synchronise this content in your cozy to be able to modify it or to keep it in case of cancellation of sharing.
banner.whats_cozy: Cozy is a secure digital home for all your data, hosted in France -

permissionLink.title: Allow anyone with the link to:
permissionLink.readDescription: Link holders can only read or download content.
permissionLink.writeDescription: Link holders can alter and delete content.

unavailable.title: Switch online!
unavailable.message: An internet connection is needed to display the list of your last sharings.

desc.rw: You can view, update, delete and add this content to your Cozy. Updates you make will be seen on other Cozies.

fingerprint.instruction:
For security reasons, please verify **%{userName} (%{userEmail})**'s identity. To do this, contact **%{userName}** via the means of communication of your choice (call, text message, instant messaging app...) and verify their security code.

Every Cozy user has a security code that they can find using their web application. Their security code must correspond to:
fingerprint.instruction2: If it is the case, then you can confirm this contact who will be considered as secure for your next sharings.

ConfirmRecipientModal.title: %{smart_count} contact waiting for confirmation |||| %{smart_count} contacts waiting for confirmation
ConfirmRecipientModal.intruction: Verify identity of their Cozy in order to give them access content you shared with them.

ShareRecipientsLimitModal.title: Problem with your sharing
ShareRecipientsLimitModal.content: You cannot share %{documentName} with more than %{limit} members.

revoke.title: Remove from sharing
revoke.desc: This contact will keep a copy but the changes won't be synchrnoized anymore.

revokeSelf.title: Remove me from sharing
revokeSelf.desc: You keep the content but it won't be updated between your Cozy anymore.
